C# Integration
==============

This section documents how to integrate Homeostasis with C# applications.

Overview
--------

Homeostasis provides comprehensive support for C# error detection and healing through the C# language plugin.

Features
--------

- Exception handling and error detection
- Automatic fix generation for common C# errors
- Integration with .NET build systems
- Support for both .NET Framework and .NET Core/5+

Usage
-----

The C# plugin is automatically activated when Homeostasis detects .cs files in your project.
